short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension adds custom UI for enhanced ChatGPT prompts handling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The tool is designed to help teachers to input ChatGPT prompt with data easily. provide various mission that teachers might used in daily works. The question generation feature allows inputting an article and, after analysis, generating exam questions. The proposal writing feature enables the generation of a preliminary draft of the plan after inputting the main outline and conducting analysis.

The author is 陳棨煜 (Chi-Yu Chen) in MHCI lab, Dept CSIE, National Formosa University.
